channel.title: Where's Hammer?
channel.description:
It's been a few months since I've been able to log in to Steam, and so when I started it up I had a few updates installed. After everything was updated I went to the "Tools" section of my Library to look for Hammer so I could work on the map I've been making and it wasn't there. I have looked for about 15 minutes, and I cannot find that stupid program. Am I just blind? I would appreciate any help.
--MirageES

item.title: Where's Hammer?
item.dc:creator: MirageES
item.description:
Thanks Cameron: D
:facepalm: Wow, it’s been so long since I used it, I completely forgot that. I feel like a complete idiot now. I’m just going to go back to lurking.

Read full topic
